meanings.definition: A person who communicates, especially one skilled at conveying information or ideas effectively.
meanings.sent1: The school principal is a great communicator, always making sure everyone understands the new rules.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a natural communicator, she can easily explain complex topics in a simple way.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his pet parrot was a better communicator than his talkative neighbor.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, a good communicator is like a bridge connecting different departments.
meanings.sent5: During the crisis, the team leader proved to be a reliable communicator, keeping everyone informed and calm.

meanings.definition: A device or program that enables communication, such as a smartphone or email client.
meanings.sent1: My new smartwatch is a handy communicator, allowing me to receive messages on the go.
meanings.sent2: The latest model of the communicator has advanced features for video calls and instant messaging.
meanings.sent3: The futuristic movie featured a communicator that could translate alien languages instantly.
meanings.sent4: The old walkie-talkie served as a reliable communicator during the camping trip in the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The high-tech communicator was a game-changer for the team, improving their coordination and efficiency.
